3: Good afternoon, Commandant.
It's been a while since we last met.
Yep, Commandant, were you expecting Lucia instead?
(Chuckles)
Oh, Commandant, you...
Lucia is not coming today, she said that she will wait at the base for the end of your isolation.
And she said something like 'I don't want the commandant to get worried.'
But I get where she's coming from. After all...
You aren't just some captain or a leader to us.
It's more like we're friends.
Anyway, I'm relieved to see Commandant looking good. I'll tell Lucia that!
Right as Liv leaves, Alpha hijacks into your channel—
Friends...
Is this your relationship with the Constructs?
The Constructs are 'artificial weapons' designed to fight against the Punishing Virus after all.
It sounds stupid to befriend weapons.

2: You're a Construct too, are you not?

3: Yes, so I never want to be anyone's friend.
Weapons should stay weapons. No less. No more.

2: But you still carry other Constructs' dog tags on you.

3: A hunter carries their trophies, no?
...Nonsense.
